body:
INSERT  INTO [10.1.13.89].FRT_MDM.dbo.OITM
    (
         ItemCode
       , ItemName
       , U_NG_CODE
       , ItmsGrpCod
       , FirmCode
       , Model_ID
       , U_NHOM
       , InvntItem
       , Createdate
       , frozenFor
       , VatGourpSa
    )
SELECT
	ItemCode
	, ItemName
	, U_NG_CODE
	, ItmsGrpCod
	, FirmCode
	, Model_ID
	, U_Nhom
	, InvntItem
	, CreateDate
	, frozenFor
	, VatGourpSa
FROM
    FRT_MDM.dbo.OITM AS O WITH (NOLOCK)
WHERE
    O.ItemCode = '';
